GSD.product_version: versions from v3.14 to before v5.10.150
GSD.description:
drm/mipi-dsi: Detach devices when removing the host

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.150 by commit 45120fa5e522d444e3fc1c5a9afc5d53eed91d00, it was introduced in version v3.14 by commit 068a00233969833f1ba925e7627797489efd6041. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/mipi-dsi: Detach devices when removing the host
